title: Flights and Flatbread
description:
Join us for Flights and Flatbread at Whispering Vine’s Fourth Street location on Tuesday, August 27, from 4-8 pm! For $25 per person, enjoy a delicious flatbread paired with a curated wine flight featuring the following Educated Guess wines:

	•	Educated Guess Napa Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – $24.99 (91 points, Wine Enthusiast & 90 points, James Suckling)
	•	Educated Guess California Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – $16.99
	•	Roots Run Deep Educated Guess Merlot 2021 – $21.99 (93 points, Wine Enthusiast)
	•	Roots Run Deep Educated Guess Chardonnay 2022 – $19.99 (91 points, Wine Enthusiast)

Indulge in these fantastic wines paired with our savory flatbread. This is the perfect way to unwind on a summer evening!

title: 🍇 Truchard Estate Wine Tasting
description:
Join us for our weekly wine tasting at the Whispering Vine South Creek location on Wednesday, August 28, from 4-7 pm. For just $15 per person, explore an exceptional lineup of Truchard Estate wines. Plus, buy a bottle from the tasting and get the tasting free!

Featured wines include:

	•	Truchard Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – $29.99 (92 points, James Suckling & Wine Enthusiast)
	•	Truchard Estate Zinfandel 2021 – $29.99
	•	Truchard Estate Pinot Noir 2022 – $29.99 (93 points, Wine Enthusiast)
	•	Truchard Estate Merlot 2020 – $24.99

Don’t miss out on this fantastic opportunity to discover these delicious wines!

title: 🍷 Caymus Wine Tasting
description:
🍷 Join us for a Special Caymus Wine Tasting 🍷

Get ready for an enjoyable evening on Wednesday, September 4th, from 4-7 PM at our South Creek location! For just $25, indulge in an exclusive tasting of some of Caymus Vineyards' finest wines.

Featured Wines:

  • Caymus California Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 ($49.99, Winery $65): A rich, dark California Cabernet with signature Caymus elegance.
  • Emmolo Sauvignon Blanc 2023 ($18.99, Winery $22): Bright and crisp, this wine showcases fresh fruit flavors with a hint of minerality, balanced by low alcohol and lively acidity.
  • Caymus-Suisun The Walking Fool 2021 ($31.99, Winery $38): A smooth red blend with lively notes of raspberry and espresso, featuring Zinfandel and Petite Sirah.
  • Bonanza by Chuck Wagner California Cabernet Sauvignon ($18.99, Winery $22): A deliciously accessible Cabernet with flavors of luscious fruit and dark chocolate.

title: Runquist Tasting
description:
Join us for a delightful weekly wine tasting on Wednesday, January 22nd, from 4-7 PM at our South Creek location! For just $15, you'll experience an exquisite selection of wines, including:

  • Jeff Runquist R Sangiovese 2021 ($25.99): Savor the bright red-cherry and strawberry flavors balanced with moderate tannins and lively acidity.
  • Jeff Runquist Z Zinfandel 2021 ($25.99): Dive into a complex blend of black fruits, spices, and a hint of bittersweet chocolate.
  • Jeff Runquist R Cabernet Franc 2022 ($25.99): Enjoy sweet ripe black cherry and currant notes with a smooth, elegant finish.
  • Jeff Runquist 1448 Proprietary Red Blend 2021 ($15.99): Relish in the juicy, soft ripe fruit flavors framed by a creamy oak finish.

As a bonus, purchase any wine from the tasting and we'll refund your tasting fee! See you there!

title: Flights & Flatbread
description:
Join us on September 17th from 4-8 PM for Flights & Flatbread, featuring Joe Czesnakowiks, Director of Sales at Dry Creek Vineyard. For just $25, enjoy a delicious flatbread and a tasting of exceptional wines, including:

  • The Mariner 2019: A 93-point dark-fruited red with a rich, seamless finish.
  • Old Vine Zinfandel 2021: A 92-point wine with vibrant layers of black cherry and plum.
  • Heritage Vines Zinfandel 2021: Bold and hearty, with raspberry and roasted anise notes.
  • Dry Chenin Blanc 2021: A refreshing 91-point white with aromas of honeydew and floral notes.

Experience the legacy of one of California’s last family-owned wineries!

title: Ferrari-Carano Wine Tasting
description:
📅 September 18th

description:

title: DAOU Tasting
description:
Join us this week for our Wine Tasting at Whispering Vine's South Creek location from 4-7 PM for just $25. Discover the bold and rich flavors of DAOU Vineyards, featuring four exceptional wines:

  • DAOU Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 ($44.99 sale, 95 Wine Enthusiast)
  • DAOU Sequentis Reserve Merlot 2020 ($39.99)
  • DAOU Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 ($19.99 sale)
  • DAOU Pessimist Red Blend 2022 ($19.99 sale)

And don't forget—if you purchase any bottle from the tasting, your tasting fee is free!

This is a perfect opportunity to enjoy some of DAOU's finest wines at incredible prices. See you there!

title: Whispering Vine Tasting
description:
Join us at Whispering Vine South Creek on Wednesday, October 9th, from 4-7 PM for an exclusive tasting of our private label wines! For just $15, enjoy a 3oz pour of the following featured wines:

  • Whispering Vine Cabernet 2020 – $19.99
  • Whispering Vine Chardonnay 2021 – $19.99
  • Whispering Vine Pinot Gris 2023 – $16.99
  • Whispering Vine Rosé 2022 – $16.99

As a special offer, purchase any bottle and get your tasting for free! Don’t miss out on this perfect mid-week wine experience!

title: Martin Ray Tasting
description:
Join us at Whispering Vine South Creek on Wednesday, October 16th, from 4-7 PM for a special tasting featuring Martin Ray wines! For just $20, enjoy a 3oz pour of these featured selections:

  • Martin Ray Synthesis Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – $34.99
  • Martin Ray Sonoma-Monterey Pinot Noir 2022 – $19.99
  • Martin Ray Napa Valley Sauvignon Blanc 2022 – $19.99
  • Martin Ray Sonoma Coast Chardonnay 2023 – $19.99

Purchase any bottle and get your tasting for free! Don’t miss this mid-week wine celebration!

title: DeLille Cellars Tasting
description:
Join us for a special Wine Tasting this Wednesday, October 23rd, from 4-7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek! For just $30, you’ll enjoy a selection of exceptional wines from DeLille Cellars. Plus, buy any wine from the tasting, and your tasting fee is waived!

Featured Wines:

  • DeLille D2 Estate Red 2021 – $39.99 (Winery $55)

93 points, Wine Spectator: A dynamic blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, and more, offering red currant, blackberry, clove, and cigar box notes.

  • DeLille Métier Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – $29.99

91 points, Wine Spectator: A smooth Cabernet with black cherry, plum, and baking spice. Wine Spectator Top 100 #66.

  • DeLille Métier Red Blend 2021 – $24.99

91 points, Wine Spectator: Black raspberry, plum, and smoky spice in this bold Syrah-Cabernet-Merlot blend.

  • DeLille Sauvignon Blanc Columbia Valley Métier 2023 – $19.99

A vibrant Sauvignon Blanc with notes of citrus, pineapple, and a lively finish.

title: Opolo Tasting
description:
Join us for our weekly wine tasting this Wednesday, October 30th, from 4-7 PM at Whispering Vine’s South Creek location! For $25, enjoy a 3oz tasting of four exceptional wines from Opolo Vineyards:

  • Opolo Cabernet Sauvignon 2019 – $29.99 (93 Tasting Panel)
  • Opolo Cabernet Sauvignon Summit Creek 2021 – $19.99 (92 Vinous)
  • Opolo Summit Creek Zinfandel 2022 – $19.99
  • Opolo Summit Creek Merlot 2021 – $19.99


As a bonus, purchase any bottle from the tasting and your tasting is free! Come savor these standout wines and explore the bold flavors of Paso Robles!

title: Kermit Lynch Reds
description:
Join us on November 6th from 4-7 PM at Whispering Vine’s South Creek location for a special Kermit Lynch tasting! For just $30, savor a 3oz pour of four curated reds:

  • Catherine & Pierre Breton 2016 – $49.99
  • Megaphone Rouge 2021 – $19.99
  • Clos La Coutale Cahors 2021 – $19.99
  • Kermit Lynch Côtes du Rhône 2021 – $17.99

Buy any bottle from the tasting, and your tasting is free! Come experience these exceptional French wines with us!

title: Pinot Noir Tasting
description:
Join us for a Pinot Noir Tasting on November 13 from 4-7 PM at Whispering Vine SouthCreek for just $30! Buy any bottle from the tasting, and enjoy the tasting for free.
Wines featured:

  • Martinelli Bella Vigna Pinot Noir 2022 - $45.99
  • EnRoute Winery Les Pommiers Pinot Noir 2022 - Sale $41.99 (Winery $60)
  • Black Kite Cellars Pinot Noir Kite’s Rest Anderson Valley - $39.99 (Winery $54)
  • Admire by Dan Kosta of Kosta Brown Pinot Noir Sonoma Coast - $31.99

Don’t miss this exclusive opportunity to taste these exceptional wines!

title: Oregon Thanksgiving Pinot Noir Tasting
description:
Join us at Whispering Vine Wine Co. South Creek for an Oregon Thanksgiving Pinot Noir Tasting on Wednesday, November 20th, from 4-7 PM! For just $25, experience a curated selection of Oregon’s top Pinot Noirs. Celebrate the season with these exceptional wines:

Featured Wines:

  • Argyle Estate Reserve Pinot Noir 2022 – $32.99
  • Purple Hands Lone Oak Pinot Noir 2022 – $29.99
  • Four Graces Pinot Noir 2021 – $26.99
  • Hyland Estates Old Vine Estate Pinot Noir 2022 – $26.99


Don’t miss this chance to savor the flavors of Oregon’s finest!

title: 🧺 Basket Party
description:
Join us for the Third Annual Holiday Basket Show! 🎄

Discover the perfect holiday gifts at Whispering Vine Wine Co.'s Third Annual Basket Show on Saturday, December 14th, 2024, from 12 PM to 2 PM. Explore beautifully curated baskets filled with hand-selected treasures, alongside stunning resin art by local artist Traci Gundersen and exquisite handcrafted jewelry by Lunar Timbre Jewelry.

Enjoy a FREE mimosa as you shop and get inspired this holiday season!

Don’t miss this festive celebration of local artistry and perfect gifting ideas!

title: 🍾 Bubbles Party
description:
Join us at Whispering Vine Wine Co. for our annual Bubbles Party. Enjoy a tasting of 30 sparkling wines paired with passed flatbreads in a relaxed and festive atmosphere. It’s a great opportunity to explore a variety of sparkling wines and enjoy an afternoon with friends during the holiday season.

Price: $55/person

This is a ticketed event. Get tickets here.

title: 🍇 Purple Friday
description:
Join us at Whispering Vine Wine Co. for our exclusive Purple Friday Wine Sale, featuring over 60 premium wines at jaw-dropping discounts!

  • 🌟 Incredible Selection: Sip and shop from a lineup of 60+ exquisite wines, including Silver Oak, Trefethen Dragon Tooth, Penfolds 389 Shiraz-Cab, and more.
  • 💰 Massive Savings: Save up to 62% off Winery Prices, with 21 wines marked down 50% or more!
  • 📍 In-Store Only: Prices are a surprise you’ll only discover when you visit!


Don’t miss this opportunity to stock up on your favorites or discover new ones. Cheers to unbeatable wine deals this Black Friday! 🍇

Available at all stores.

*Prices end 12/6/24 and is subject to availability

title: Far Niente Tasting
description:
Experience a premium tasting featuring four exceptional wines from the Far Niente family for $40 per person. Plus, purchase a bottle from the tasting, and your tasting is free!

  • Bella Union Cabernet Sauvignon 2019 – Rich, complex, 92 points (Wine Spectator & Wine Enthusiast)
  • Far Niente Chardonnay 2022 – Bright, vibrant, citrus and floral notes
  • Post & Beam Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – Bold, plush, 95 points (Tasting Panel)
  • EnRoute Les Pommiers Pinot Noir 2022 – Silky, elegant, red berry flavors

Don’t miss this incredible opportunity to taste and take home world-class wines!

title: Duckhorn Portfolio Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, January 15th, from 4PM to 7PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an exclusive Duckhorn Tasting! For $35 per person, experience a selection of premium Duckhorn wines listed below. Plus, buy any bottle from the tasting and get your tasting FREE. Don’t miss this opportunity to savor exceptional wines crafted by one of Napa’s finest producers.

Featured Wines:

  • Duckhorn Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Sale $52.99 (Winery $80)
  • Duckhorn Napa Valley Merlot 2021 – $49.99 (Winery $60)
  • Goldeneye Anderson Valley Pinot Noir 2021 – Sale $49.99 (Winery $62)
  • Duckhorn Napa Valley Chardonnay 2022 – $29.99 (Winery $38)

title: 🍇 Far Niente Wine Estates Tasting
description:
Enjoy an exclusive tasting of wines from Far Niente Wine Estates, including Far Niente, Nickel & Nickel, Dolce, EnRoute, Post & Beam, and Bella Union. Passed flatbreads will complement a curated selection of Chardonnays, Cabernet Sauvignons, and more, showcasing the craftsmanship of these iconic Napa Valley labels.
Price: $100 per person
Reservations: Available on Tock
Limited to 50 guests.

Featured Wines Include:

  • Far Niente Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2021: 96 points James Suckling
  • Nickel & Nickel State Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon 2021: 97 points James Suckling
  • Dolce 2017: 97 points James Suckling
  • EnRoute "Les Pommiers" Pinot Noir 2022: Plush and ripe with vibrant raspberry notes
  • Post & Beam by Far Niente Carneros Chardonnay 2022: 94 points Wine Enthusiast
  • Bella Union Cabernet Sauvignon 2019: A balanced and complex Napa blend

title: Trefethen Tasting
description:
Join us on January 29th, from 4-7 PM at our South Creek location for a tasting featuring Trefethen wines! For just $30, explore a selection of exceptional wines, including:

  • Trefethen Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 ($49.99, Winery $75)
  • Trefethen Merlot 2021 ($39.99)
  • Trefethen Estate Chardonnay 2022 ($26.99, Winery $40)
  • Trefethen Eshcol Red 2020 ($24.99)


Bonus: Purchase any bottle from the tasting, and we’ll refund your tasting fee!

title: Truchard Vineyards Tasting
description:
Join us on February 5th for an exclusive Truchard Estate Wine Tasting at Whispering Vine South Creek! For just $25, indulge in a curated selection of exceptional wines from Truchard Vineyards, known for their rich character and elegance.

Featured Wines:

  • 🍷 Truchard Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Bold and fruit-forward with blackberry, chocolate, and a creamy texture. (92 James Suckling, 92 Wine Enthusiast)
  • 🍷 Truchard Estate Zinfandel 2021 – Exotic and jammy with notes of boysenberry, cranberry, and sweet vanilla.
  • 🍷 Truchard Estate Pinot Noir 2022 – Vibrant with cranberry, pomegranate, and warming spices. (93 Wine Enthusiast)
  • 🍷 Truchard Estate Merlot 2020 – Lush with wild blueberry, ripe cherry, and a smooth, elegant finish.


💡 Special Offer: Buy a bottle from the tasting and your tasting is FREE!

Don't miss this chance to explore Truchard's outstanding wines at an incredible value. See you there! 🍷✨

title: The Prisoner Wine Company Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, February 12, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an exclusive tasting of The Prisoner Wine Company’s bold and expressive wines. Experience the rich flavors of:

  • The Prisoner Red Blend ($39.99)
  • Saldo Zinfandel ($23.99)
  • Saldo Shiraz ($24.99)
  • Blindfold Sauvignon Blanc ($24.99)

Tasting Fee: $20 – But it’s waived with the purchase of any bottle from the tasting!

Don’t miss this opportunity to savor some of The Prisoner’s most sought-after wines at special pricing. No reservations required—just stop by and enjoy!

title: Belle Glos Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, February 19, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an exclusive Belle Glos wine tasting. For $25, experience a lineup of beautifully crafted wines, including their renowned Pinot Noirs and Chardonnay, each showcasing the elegance and depth of California’s top vineyards.

Special Offer: Purchase any bottle from the tasting and your tasting is free!

Featured Wines:

  • Belle Glos Dairyman Vineyard Pinot Noir 2022 – 94 pts, Wine Enthusiast
  • Belle Glos Las Alturas Vineyard Pinot Noir 2021 – 91 pts, Wine Enthusiast
  • Belle Glos Clark & Telephone Vineyard Pinot Noir 2023 – 90 pts, Wine Enthusiast
  • Belle Glos Glasir Holt Vineyard Chardonnay 2022 – A vibrant, coast-driven Chardonnay

Don’t miss this opportunity to savor these exceptional wines!

title: Ferrari-Carano Tasting
description:
Join us at Whispering Vine South Creek for an exclusive Ferrari-Carano wine tasting, featuring a selection of rich and expressive wines from this renowned Sonoma winery.
Tasting Fee: $25 (Waived with the purchase of any bottle from the tasting!)
Featured Wines:

  • 🍷 Ferrari-Carano Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – A bold, full-bodied Cabernet with layers of dark fruit, mocha, and spice.
  • 🍷 Ferrari-Carano Siena 2022 – 91 pts, Wine Enthusiast & James Suckling – A smooth, fruit-forward blend of Sangiovese, Malbec, Petite Sirah, and Cabernet.
  • 🍷 Ferrari-Carano Merlot 2021 – 91 pts, Wine Enthusiast – Velvety and rich, with notes of cherries, currants, cinnamon, and cocoa.
  • 🍷 Ferrari-Carano Trésor 2021 – A Bordeaux-style blend with elegant layers of wild berries, mocha, and vanilla, leading to a long, expressive finish.

Don't miss this opportunity to taste these exceptional wines and take home a bottle (or two)!

title: Flights & Flatbread with Coquerel Wines
description:
Join us on Tuesday, March 12, from 4–8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth St. for an evening of Flights & Flatbread featuring the exceptional wines of Coquerel Wines. Hosted by Coquerel Director of Sales, Stacey Pytlewski, this tasting showcases a diverse selection of Napa Valley wines alongside a delicious flatbread pairing.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Includes a flatbread and a tasting of four Coquerel wines!)

Featured Wines:

  • 🍷 2021 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon – A bold, structured red with dark berries, soft tannins, and a long cherry finish.
  • 🍷 2021 Cabernet Franc ‘Bennett’s Vineyard’ – Rich and aromatic, with cassis, dark berries, and a hint of black pepper.
  • 🍷 2020 Coquerel Notre Cuvée – A full-bodied, concentrated blend with notes of violets, sweet currants, and spice.
  • 🍷 2024 Le Petit Sauvignon Blanc – Bright and refreshing, with grapefruit, guava, and pineapple flavors.


Discover the elegance of Coquerel Wines, located in the heart of Calistoga, Napa Valley, and learn about their winemaking philosophy while enjoying an expertly paired flatbread.

Reserve your spot and indulge in this unforgettable tasting experience!

title: Battle of Paso Robles Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, March 5, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an exciting Battle of Paso Robles tasting, where two powerhouse wineries—Justin and Daou—go head-to-head. Taste and compare their bold, expressive wines and decide for yourself which reigns supreme!

Tasting Fee: $35 (Waived with the purchase of any bottle from the tasting!)

Featured Wines:

  • 🍷 Justin Isosceles 2021 – 93 pts, James Suckling – A rich and structured blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc, and Merlot with deep fruit, mocha, and spice.
  • 🍷 DAOU Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – 95 pts, James Suckling – A bold, full-bodied Cab with blackberry compote, cigar box, and graphite, complemented by seamless tannins.
  • 🍷 Justin Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – A complex and balanced Cab with notes of cherry, toasted oak, vanilla, and spice.
  • 🍷 DAOU Cabernet Sauvignon 2023 – A lush, fruit-forward expression with black cherry, cassis, and baking spice, leading to a long, structured finish.


Don’t miss this Paso Robles showdown, where two legendary wineries bring their best to the table. Buy a bottle, and your tasting is free!

title: High Scoring Chardonnay Flight
description:
Join us on Wednesday, March 12, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a High Scoring Chardonnay Flight featuring a lineup of 95 to 92-point rated Chardonnays from top producers. Experience the elegance, richness, and complexity of these highly acclaimed wines.

Tasting Fee: $30 (Waived with the purchase of any bottle from the tasting!)

Featured Wines:

  • Ramey Russian River Chardonnay 2021 – 95 pts, Wine Enthusiast – A vibrant and concentrated Chardonnay with layers of crisp apple, pastry crust, and lemon curd.
  • The Calling Dutton Ranch Chardonnay 2022 – 93 pts, Wine Spectator – Expressive and tropical, with notes of papaya, grilled pineapple, and vanilla shortbread.
  • Flowers Sonoma Coast Chardonnay 2023 – 93 pts, Wine Spectator – Bright and mineral-driven, with hints of Kaffir lime, citrus, and almond skin.
  • Walt Sonoma Coast Chardonnay 2020 – 92 pts, Wine Spectator – Floral and fresh, featuring honeysuckle, pear, lemon pastry, and baking spice.


Come explore top-rated Chardonnays from renowned wineries and take home your favorite—buy a bottle, and your tasting is free!

title: Ancient Peaks Winery Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, March 19, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a tasting with Ancient Peaks Winery, a family-owned estate from Paso Robles’ southernmost vineyard, Margarita Vineyard. Experience their bold, terroir-driven wines that showcase the richness of California’s Central Coast.

Tasting Fee: $20 (Refunded with the purchase of any bottle from the tasting!)

Featured Wines:

  • Ancient Peaks Renegade 2021 – 92 pts, Vinous & Wine Enthusiast – A bold blend of Syrah, Petit Verdot, and Malbec with wild berry, cocoa, and smoky spice.
  • Ancient Peaks Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 90 pts, Tasting Panel & Wine Enthusiast – Deep and complex with layers of plum, cassis, and violet, finishing with fresh acidity and fine tannins.
  • Ancient Peaks Zinfandel 2021 – 93 pts, Wine Enthusiast & Tasting Panel – A vibrant and savory Zin with notes of cherry, mocha, pepper, and cedar.
  • Ancient Peaks Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – 90 pts, Vinous & Wine Enthusiast – Bright and refreshing with citrus, guava, and a crisp, fresh finish.

Don’t miss this opportunity to explore the flavors of Paso Robles and take home your favorite—buy a bottle and your tasting is free!

title: Passion for Pinot Party
description:
Celebrate an afternoon of exceptional Pinot Noir at Whispering Vine Fourth St. for $95 per person. Enjoy a curated selection of 30+ Pinot Noirs, featuring cult and fan favorites like Rochioli, Kosta Browne, Sea Smoke, Martinelli, and Kistler. Each wine will be thoughtfully paired with gourmet small plates crafted by Chef Josh and Chef Lee, creating an unforgettable tasting experience. With limited space available, this is a must-attend event for Pinot lovers!

Reserve on Tock

title: Opolo Vineyards Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, March 26, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an exclusive Opolo Vineyards tasting featuring a selection of bold and expressive wines from Paso Robles.

Tasting Fee: $25 (Waived with the purchase of any bottle from the tasting!)

Featured Wines:

  • Opolo Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon 2019 – 98 pts, Double Gold, Sunset Wine Competition. Rich and full-bodied with black cherry, toasted marshmallow, and roast coffee.
  • Opolo Petite Sirah 2021 – Deeply colored with aromas of nutmeg and smoked meats, leading into baked blueberries, ripe plum, and mocha.
  • Opolo Summit Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 92 pts, Vinous. Smooth and structured with black currant, cassis, caramel, and leather, finishing long and plush.
  • Opolo Viognier 2021 – Floral and tropical with notes of peach, honey, nectarine, and refreshing citrus, balanced with bright acidity.

Experience Opolo’s signature bold flavors and take home your favorite—buy a bottle, and your tasting is free.

title: Miner Family Winery Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, April 2, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an exclusive Miner Family Winery tasting featuring a selection of elegant, terroir-driven wines from Napa Valley and the Santa Lucia Highlands.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Waived with the purchase of any bottle from the tasting!)

Featured Wines:

  • Miner Pinot Noir Garys’ Vineyard 2021 – A single-vineyard Pinot Noir showcasing red fruit, floral notes, and spice with a silky texture and elegant finish.
  • Miner Emily’s Cabernet 2019 – 90 pts, Wine Spectator. A bold Cabernet Sauvignon with notes of black cherry, cassis, and wild thyme, framed by soft, approachable tannins.
  • Miner Napa Cabernet 2019 – Rich and structured, with bold flavors of cedar, cocoa, and juicy cherries, balanced by ripe acidity and a lingering finish.
  • Miner Viognier – Aromatic and vibrant, with citrus, honeysuckle, and tropical fruit, offering a perfect balance of acidity and plush texture.

Experience the craftsmanship of Miner Family Winery and take home your favorite—buy a bottle, and your tasting is free.

title: Napa vs. Sonoma Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, April 9, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a side-by-side tasting of premium wines from two of California’s most iconic regions—Napa Valley and Sonoma County.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Waived with the purchase of any bottle from the tasting!)

Featured Wines:

  • Sinegal Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 (Napa) – Deep and refined with dark cherry, mocha, sweet tobacco, and silky tannins.
  • Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon 2018 (Sonoma) – 95 pts, Tasting Panel. Elegant and layered with blue fruit, cassis, fig, and French oak influence.
  • Clos du Val Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 (Napa) – 96 pts, Tasting Panel. Savory and structured with plum, cedar, black tea, and balanced acidity.
  • Sinegal Details Sonoma 2021 (Sonoma) – Bright and expressive with black cherry, cassis, floral aromatics, and vibrant minerality.

Taste the nuances of Napa and Sonoma, and decide for yourself which region wins—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.

title: Flights & Flatbread with Paul Hobbs’ Wines
description:
Join us on Monday, April 22, from 4–8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth St. for Flights & Flatbread featuring an exceptional tasting of Paul Hobbs’ wines. Hosted by Regional Manager Trish Toye, this event offers a curated selection from Napa, Sonoma, and Argentina—paired with a flatbread.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Includes a flatbread and a tasting of four wines)

Featured Wines:

  • Crossbarn Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2020 – 94 pts, Tasting Panel. Lush and structured with boysenberry, mocha, licorice, and firm tannins.
  • Vina Cobos Bramare Uco Valley Malbec 2022 – 95 pts, James Suckling. Dense and full-bodied with black fruit, cocoa, mint, and graphite.
  • Crossbarn Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir 2021 – 93 pts, Vinous. Bright and expressive with red cherry, lavender, rose petal, and spice.
  • Vina Cobos Felino Malbec 2023 – 93 pts, James Suckling. Fresh and spicy with blackberry, thyme, violets, and moderate tannins.

Experience Paul Hobbs’ world-class winemaking across three terroirs—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.

title: Russian River Pinot Noir Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, April 16, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a focused tasting of Russian River Valley Pinot Noirs, showcasing the elegance, vibrancy, and complexity that define this world-renowned region.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

  • Bricoleur Pinot Noir 2021 – 92 pts, Wine Enthusiast. Complex and bright with cherry, hibiscus, pomegranate, and subtle five-spice notes.
  • Belle Glos Dairyman Vineyard Pinot Noir 2021 – 94 pts, Tasting Panel. Luxurious and bold with spiced cranberry, black cherry, chocolate, and balsamic depth.
  • EnRoute Les Pommiers Pinot Noir 2022 – 93 pts, Wine Enthusiast. Delicate and expressive with dried rose, cherry, and berry pie, supported by lively acidity and fine tannins.
  • The Calling Russian River Pinot Noir 2022 – 90 pts, Wine Enthusiast. Floral and juicy with raspberry, cherry, orange blossom, and balanced acidity.

Come explore the beauty and diversity of Russian River Pinot Noir—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.

title: High Scoring Sauvignon Blanc Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, April 23, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine - South Creek for a refreshing lineup of highly rated Sauvignon Blancs from Napa Valley to Marlborough. Crisp, bright, and aromatic—these wines are perfect for spring sipping.

Tasting Fee: $20 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

  • Illumination Sauvignon Blanc 2022 – 94 pts, James Suckling. Elegant and textured with pineapple, lemon, honey blossom, and phenolic depth.
  • St. Supéry Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – 93 pts, Wine Enthusiast. Vibrant and citrusy with mango, pith, and sea salt, wrapped in a silky mouthfeel.
  • Silverado Miller Ranch Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – 90 pts, Robert Parker. Grapefruit, passion fruit, and a touch of oak lead to a focused lime finish.
  • Allan Scott Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc 2024 – 93 pts, Wine Spectator. Intense and mouthwatering with Key lime, grilled pineapple, lemongrass, and sea salt.

Explore top-tier Sauvignon Blancs from world-class producers—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.

title: Whispering Vine Wine Co. Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, April 30, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a special tasting of our very own Whispering Vine Wine Co. selections. Sample through a lineup of fresh, expressive wines crafted for everyday enjoyment.

Tasting Fee: $20 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

  • Whispering Vine Cabernet Sauvignon 2020 – Silky and refined with crushed raspberries, peppery herbs, white smoke, and a long, energetic finish.
  • Whispering Vine Pinot Noir 2023 – Bright and vibrant with tart cherry, cranberry, cola, and baking spice, balanced by a delightful lightness.
  • Whispering Vine Chardonnay 2023 – Tropical and floral on the nose with white peach, Meyer lemon, and subtle minerality on a balanced palate.
  • Whispering Vine Pinot Gris 2023 – Creamy and refreshing with honeysuckle, lemon zest, lychee, and a clean, mineral finish.

Taste the wines that represent our name—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.

title: A Tour of Italy – Italian Wine & Flatbread Tasting
description:
Join us on Saturday, May 17, from 1–3 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth St. for an immersive Italian wine experience. A Tour of Italy will feature 30+ Italian red wines paired with a selection of authentic Italian flatbreads. This walk-around tasting offers a chance to explore a wide range of iconic regions and varietals in a relaxed, elegant setting.

Tasting Fee: $70

Limited to 50 guests

Featured Wines Include:

• Fèlsina "Colonia" Chianti Classico Gran Selezione 2017 – 96 pts, Robert Parker & Vinous. A powerful yet graceful Sangiovese with layered cherry, rose petal, cedar, and limestone-driven minerality.

• Argiano Brunello di Montalcino 2019 – 95 pts, Wine Spectator. Rich and complex with cherry, plum, herbs, and floral notes supported by balanced structure.

• Renato Ratti Marcenasco Barolo 2020 – 94 pts, Wine Spectator. Racy and elegant with pure cherry, rose, and red currant backed by a long, mineral finish.

• Cesari Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2018 – 91 pts, Wine Spectator. A savory, full-flavored blend with notes of black currant, green olive, coffee, and spice.

Don't miss this opportunity to taste some of Italy’s most celebrated wines—all in one unforgettable afternoon.

title: Mollydooker Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, May 7, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a bold and expressive tasting from one of Australia’s most iconic producers—Mollydooker. Known for their rich, fruit-driven style, these wines deliver intensity, personality, and serious flavor.

Tasting Fee: $25 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

  • Mollydooker Blue Eyed Boy Shiraz 2022 – 92 pts, Wine Spectator & Wine Advocate. Lush and layered with blackberry preserves, dark chocolate, and hints of violet and spice.
  • Mollydooker The Boxer Shiraz – Robust and velvety with dark cherries, mocha, clove, and toasted oak.
  • Mollydooker Two Left Feet 2022 – A rich blend of Shiraz, Merlot, and Cabernet with blackberry, plum, vanilla, and ripe, silky tannins.
  • Mollydooker The Maitre D Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – 90 pts, Wine Spectator. Juicy and vibrant with raspberry, cherry, mint, eucalyptus, and a savory spice finish.

Don’t miss this chance to experience the power and charm of Mollydooker’s signature style—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.

title: La Spinetta Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, May 14, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a special tasting featuring the expressive wines of La Spinetta, with special guest Fabio Longano, U.S. Ambassador of La Spinetta, on hand to share insights and stories behind the wines.

Tasting Fee: $25 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

  • La Spinetta Barbera D’Asti Superiore 2022 – Deep ruby red with red fruit and delicate spice. Structured, velvety, and fresh with a long, harmonious finish.
  • La Spinetta ‘Il Nero di Casanova’ Sangiovese Toscana 2020 – 92 pts, James Suckling. Polished and focused with cherries, dried orange peel, and savory spice on a vibrant, linear palate.
  • La Spinetta Toscana Vermentino 2023 – Fresh and gentle with notes of green apple, orange blossom, and a clean, mineral finish.
  • La Spinetta Colli Timorasso “Derthona” – Elegant and complex with floral, honeyed aromas, bright acidity, and a long, clean finish.

Taste the elegance of La Spinetta with guidance from the source—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
